title: Bramley apple and blackberry soufflé
description: A delightful autumnal dessert from Michel Roux Jr that proves the dreaded soufflé is easier to prepare than you might think. Equipment and preparation: you will need 4 x 10cm/4in soufflé dishes.
ingredients: 2 Bramley apples, peeled, cored and roughly chopped
6 biscuits, such as gingernuts, soaked in a splash of brandy or whisky (optional)
